title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-2.1 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-2.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to set forth the methods and procedures governing the availability. location and nature of those records of the New York State Department of Health subject to the provisions of article 6A of the Public Officers Law, known as the Personal Privacy Protection Law. and the rules of the Committee on Open Government. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
50-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
